programme.desc: The classic TV game show Supermarket Sweep, hosted and executive produced by Emmy Award-nominated comedienne and actress Leslie Jones is a fast-paced and energetic series following three teams of two as they battle it out using their grocery shopping skills and knowledge of merchandise to win big cash prizes.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S2
programme.desc: Master builder and household favourite Tommy Walsh is joined by expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards, as they meet people across the UK who are struggling with household chaos, grime and clutter. Much more than a makeover show, our dynamic professionals provide real-life, practical solutions, invaluable tips and insider tricks to give viewers brilliant take-away ideas for bettering their own living spaces.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo: The New Generation
programme.desc: Kim, Yoyo and Yaya discuss the importance of being hygienic and clean. Kim then conducts an experiment using glitter and glue to show Yoyo, Yaya and the audience the importance of washing their hands. Why segment - Why do we sneeze? Using a water spray, green coloured water and paper towels, Kim explains why our bodies react to dust and foreign particles by sneezing.

programme.title: Super Rover & Friends

Seemingly strange bedfellows, Math has been a part of Art for thousands of years. Together, they spy the Golden Ratio in paintings, discover symmetry in artwork and scout out perspectives in then galleries. Then, armed with the Math ideas, the duo goes to an art school to see how using Math in Art improves their craft. It's Math like you've never imagined it before.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40

programme.title: Sunny Side Up

programme.title: Tanglin

Norleena is keen on pursuing a decorative cake business, but has doubts about its viability. Things at Xue Organics come to a head when Suzanne tries to get close to a major potential investor.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It S2

programme.title: 麻婆斗妇

programme.title: 敦煌，千年不散的宴席
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 中华民族之所以五千年生生不息、绵延不绝，就是因为我们的语言、文字、风俗、饮食都是千年传承，从来没有中断。观众发现，以往秦川、安秋导演创作的敦煌纪录片都承载了非常厚重的历史文化信息，这次的美食片却大不一样，从主题定位、人物故事、叙事方式等都有了非常大的改变，叙述风格也生动活泼了很多，让观众看到了更多的人间烟火，一种田园诗般的美。该片通过将敦煌壁画饮食文化呈现出来，并将当下敦煌百姓的生活状态、一日三餐、加工食物的过程忠实记录下来，以展现敦煌饮食文化的传承与发展。.

programme.desc: 叶山娃的“裹脚肉”，“苗乡第一刀”的招牌，让他在“江湖”立足。全家出动，是酒楼更是酒家。陈有文的“蛋圆子和焯蛋”，来自田埂深处那个冒着炊烟的人家，用一出家宴为秋收画上最好的句点。从未离开过小镇的刘忠兄妹一辈子守着他们的小店，车马穿行，他们不改初心……守望，也是一种力量。早早停留，他们也许至今没有见识过世界的广博，对大多数人来讲，似乎有一个能看到头的未来。但对他们来说，或许只是不在急急切切的出世与入世间迷失，心中自有愿景和希望。他们选择留守乡村，让他们秉持真心，专注一味，给自己的美食拖住了底。不是止步原点，.

programme.desc: (PG) 中华民族之所以五千年生生不息、绵延不绝，就是因为我们的语言、文字、风俗、饮食都是千年传承，从来没有中断。观众发现，以往秦川、安秋导演创作的敦煌纪录片都承载了非常厚重的历史文化信息，这次的美食片却大不一样，从主题定位、人物故事、叙事方式等都有了非常大的改变，叙述风格也生动活泼了很多，让观众看到了更多的人间烟火，一种田园诗般的美。该片通过将敦煌壁画饮食文化呈现出来，并将当下敦煌百姓的生活状态、一日三餐、加工食物的过程忠实记录下来，以展现敦煌饮食文化的传承与发展。.
